com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.feature

Interface Feature

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Tickable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFeature, AutoRespawnFeature, BossBarFeature, ChannelFeature, ClearInventoryFeature, DoubleJumpFeature, DuelFeature, DummyFeature, GameModeFeature, HealFeature, JumpPadFeature, KitFeature, LobbyFeature, MapFeature, MapInfoFeature, MobFeature, NoBlockBreakFeature, NoBlockPlaceFeature, NoDamageFeature, NoHungerLossFeature, PersonalScoreboardFeature, PostGameFeature, RemovePotionEffectsFeature, ScoreboardFeature, SpawnFeature, TeamFeature, TeamSelectFeature, TimeFeature, VoidTeleportFeature, VoteFeature

    public interface Feature
extends Tickable
    A Feature is a piece of logic that is active during a Phase. It typically listens to certain events and reacts based of that. A Feature is a small module that can be reused in a variety of GameModes

      • getDependencies

        @Nonnull
default java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends Feature>> getDependencies()
        Returns:
        all features this feature depends on. this feature will load before any dependency in this list and the dependencies are required to be active

      • getSoftDependencies

        @Nonnull
default java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends Feature>> getSoftDependencies()
        Returns:
        all features this phase soft depends on. this feature will load before any dependency in this list, but the dependencies are not required to be active

      • getMarkers

        @Nonnull
default MarkerDefinition[] getMarkers()
        Returns:
        a list of all markers this feature uses
